item.title: Words and sentences: |uma and Da at Mowbray
item.summary: |uma and Da provide words and sentences at Mowbray. These mostly include terms from everyday life, such as objects of use and parts of the body.
item.comments: 1) This story is found in Book XIII & XIV-1
item.author: |uma (XIII)
Da (XIV)
